scripts.build-gen-package: cd cli/gen-package; elm make src/Generate.elm --optimize --output=../gen-package.js; cp ../gen-package.js ../../dist/gen-package.js
scripts.build-gen-package-debug: cd cli/gen-package; elm make src/Generate.elm --output=../gen-package.js; cp ../gen-package.js ../../dist/gen-package.js
scripts.gen-package-local: (npm run build; node dist/index.js src/Generate.elm --output engine --cwd cli/gen-package --debug --flags-from playground/docs/gql-docs.json)
scripts.gen-package: (npm run build; node dist/index.js install elm/json)
scripts.gen-package-core: (npm run build; node dist/index.js install elm/core)
scripts.playground: (npm run build; node dist/index.js src/Gen.elm --debug --cwd playground)
scripts.playground-watch: (npm run build; node dist/index.js src/Gen.elm --debug --watch --cwd playground)
